verses.roman:
siṁha-dvāra-dakṣiṇe āche tailaṅgī-gābhī-gaṇa
tāhāṅ yāi' paḍilā prabhu hañā acetana

synonyms: siṁha-dvāra—of the gate named Siṁha-dvāra; dakṣiṇe—on the southern side; āche—there are; tailaṅgī-gābhī-gaṇa—cows belonging to the Tailaṅga district; tāhāṅ—there; yāi'-going; paḍilā—fell down; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; hañā acetana—becoming unconscious.
translation: He went to a cow shed on the southern side of the Siṁha-dvāra. There the Lord fell down unconscious among cows from the district of Tailaṅga.
